### DEG Heatmap

```{r heatmap_diffexp, echo=FALSE, fig.width=10, fig.height=6}
all_diffexp_genes <- map(result_array, function(x) {
  x %>%
    as.data.frame(stringsAsFactors = FALSE) %>%
    dplyr::filter(padj <= fdr) %>%
    rownames()
}) %>%
  flatten() %>%
  as.character() %>%
  unique()

order_func <- get_order_func(heatmap_mode)
select <- order(
  order_func(
    counts(dds, normalized = TRUE)[all_diffexp_genes, ]
  ),
  decreasing = TRUE
)

# filter top_n genes
select <- select[1:heatmap_n_genes]

# replace original gene ids with gene symbols to make it more readable
exp_mat <- assay(rld)[all_diffexp_genes, ][select, ] %>%
  as_tibble(rownames = type_in) %>%
  left_join(
    translate_gene_ids(
      .[[type_in]],
      sp_info = get_species_info(species),
      from_type = type_in,
      to_type = "SYMBOL",
      drop = FALSE
    )
  ) %>%
  dplyr::select(-matches(type_in)) %>%
  dplyr::distinct(SYMBOL, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  tidyr::drop_na() %>%
  column_to_rownames(var = "SYMBOL") %>%
  as.matrix()

annot_df <- colData(dds) %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  dplyr::select(matches(annotation_heatmap))

if (heatmap_n_genes < 50) {
  show_rownames <- TRUE
} else {
  show_rownames <- FALSE
}

heatmaply(exp_mat,
  colors = "RdYlBu",
  scale = "row",
  xlab = "Samples",
  ylab = "Genes",
  Colv = F,
  k_row = NA,
  seriate = "mean",
  plot_method = "plotly",
  col_side_colors = annot_df,
  showticklabels = c(TRUE, show_rownames)
)
```
